thread.title: How Miami-Dade County Public Schools Kept Its Superintendent

author: Arian Campo-Flores
title: How Miami-Dade County Public Schools Kept Its Superintendent
text:
Alberto Carvalho had been wanting to meet with Perla Tabares Hantman, chair of the Miami-Dade County School Board, since last week, and the two finally met privately on Monday at his office, Ms. Hantman said. The superintendent told her he had been offered the chancellor position in New York City, but hadnâ€™t yet accepted it.
In subsequent days, he also spoke with additional board members to explain the situation, prompting Ms. Tabares Hantman to call an emergency board meeting for Thursday.
